content:
I've prepared a draft list of topics for reconciliation at this week's WGM. It's just a subset, but I'd like folks to label "top 5" so we can prioritize.

Please review here

Please take a look! (Especially @Grahame Grieve @Lloyd McKenzie @Ewout Kramer @Kensaku Kawamoto @John Moehrke @Kevin Shekleton @Isaac Vetter @Jenni Syed @Michael Donnelly @Pascal Pfiffner and others at the WGM).
To follow up: we will be reviewing SMART on FHIR ballot comments Thursday Q2 and Q3 in Room 407.
